Hello blank fragment
//BMI category description----------------------- A BMI of less than 18.5 indicates that you are underweight,so you may need to put on some weight. You are recommended to ask your doctor or a dietitian for advice. A BMI indicates that you are at a healthy weight for your height. By maintaining a healthy weight,you lower your risk of developing serious health problems. A BMI of over 25–29.9 indicates that you are slightly overweight. You may be advised to lose some weight for health reasons. you are recommended to talk to your doctor or a dietitian for advice. A BMI of over 30 indicates that you are heavily overweight. Your health may be at risk if you do not lose weight. you are recommended to talk to your doctor or a dietitian for advice.
18.5 – 25.0 < 16 > 40 BMI-(Body Mass Index) হচ্ছে দেহের উচ্চতা এবং ওজনের উপর ভিত্তি করে প্রাপ্ত একটি সূচক। এটি দ্বারা দেহের ওজন স্বাভাবিকের চেয়ে কম না বেশি নির্ণয় করা যায়। \n\nBMI is an index based on body height and weight.By this, the body weight can be determined more or less than normal.
To achieve healthy weight you have to reduce: To achieve your healthy weight you need: Your weight is already healthy:
